Save Multiple Dataframes to an Excel Workbook

save.dataframes.to.excel.Rd

This function creates an Excel workbook and adds each dataframe from a given list as a separate sheet. The name of each sheet corresponds to the name of the dataframe in the list.

save.dataframes.to.excel(data.list, file.name)

Arguments

data.list

A named list of dataframes to be written to the Excel workbook.

file.name

A string specifying the file name for the Excel workbook, including the `.xlsx` extension.

Value

None. The function saves the Excel workbook to the specified file.

Examples

# Example usage:
# data.list <- list("Sheet1" = df1, "Sheet2" = df2)
# save.dataframes.to.excel(data.list, "output.xlsx")
